Title: TVersiPlay - Media Rendering Application powered by UPnP & TVersity
Description: Open source application written in C# and WPF. Utilizes Prism application library using unity as dependency injection container.Use Fluid Kit controls & UPnP tools for developers by Intel. Aim to create a touch screen based rich client user experience for Tversity media server.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Open source application written in C# and WPF. Utilizes Prism application library using unity as dependency injection container.Use Fluid Kit controls & UPnP tools for developers by Intel. Aim to create a touch screen based rich client user experience for Tversity media server.

More documentation coming soon!

The vision behind TVersiPlay is writing a user friendly, touch-screen based rich client application using C# and WPF.

Needed to run the application :
  • Download current source
  • All third party binaries are mapped from the Shared Binaries folder at the root of the Source Code directory.
  • Compile solution


Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.
